Comments_Questions: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
Comments_List: I learned how to work with a broad range of tools relevant to my project. This involved learning how to code in Python, how to use NLTK, how to work with graphics modules, and how to use sound generation modules.

Strength: I loved the flexibility and freedom with which I was able to pursue my project. It was so rewarding to see my project grow from an idea in my head to a set of algorithms with tangible output.
Weakness:  I wish the course requirements were a bit more clear. For example, I was unsure at the beginning of the course when/how to submit my project proposal.
